preflight.title: Pre-flight Checks
preflight.description: Before proceeding, please review the following checks:
preflight.transactionsWithoutVat: {{count}} transaction(s) have no VAT rate assigned
preflight.allTransactionsHaveVat: All transactions have VAT rates assigned
preflight.unpaidInvoices: {{count}} invoice(s) are marked as sent but not paid
preflight.unreconciledTransactions: {{count}} transaction(s) are not reconciled with bank
preflight.allChecksPassed: All checks passed! You can proceed with confidence.
preflight.hasErrors: There are critical issues that must be fixed before proceeding.
preflight.hasWarnings: There are warnings that you should review. You can still proceed if needed.
preflight.hasInfo: There are some items for your information. You can proceed.

selectPeriod.title: Select VAT Return Period
selectPeriod.description: Choose the VAT period you want to prepare a return for. You can select a standard quarterly period or define a custom date range.

reviewTransactions.title: Review Transactions
reviewTransactions.description: Review all transactions in this period. Ensure VAT rates are correctly assigned before calculating your VAT return.
reviewTransactions.noTransactions: No transactions found for this period.

calculateVat.title: VAT Calculation
calculateVat.description: Review the calculated VAT values for each box of your VAT return. All values are rounded to whole pounds as per HMRC requirements.
calculateVat.notCalculated: VAT return has not been calculated yet.
calculateVat.box1Label: VAT due on sales and other outputs
calculateVat.box1Description: Total output VAT from your income transactions and invoices.
calculateVat.box2Label: VAT due on acquisitions from EC
calculateVat.box2Description: VAT on goods purchased from EU member states. Currently not applicable post-Brexit for most businesses.
calculateVat.box3Description: Sum of Box 1 and Box 2. This is the total VAT you owe.
calculateVat.box4Description: Total input VAT from your expense transactions that you can reclaim.
calculateVat.box5Label: Net VAT to pay or reclaim
calculateVat.box5Description: Box 3 minus Box 4. Positive means you owe HMRC, negative means you are due a refund.
calculateVat.box6Label: Total value of sales excluding VAT
calculateVat.box6Description: Total value of all sales before VAT is added.
calculateVat.box7Label: Total value of purchases excluding VAT
calculateVat.box7Description: Total value of all purchases before VAT is added.
calculateVat.box8Label: Total value of supplies to EC
calculateVat.box8Description: Value of goods supplied to EU member states. Currently placeholder for Phase 1.
calculateVat.box9Label: Total value of acquisitions from EC
calculateVat.box9Description: Value of goods acquired from EU member states. Currently placeholder for Phase 1.
calculateVat.roundingNote: Note: All box values are rounded to whole pounds as required by HMRC.

reviewVerify.title: Review and Verify
reviewVerify.description: Please carefully review your VAT return before saving. Compare with previous periods and check for any unusual values.
reviewVerify.noVatReturn: No VAT return data available. Please go back and calculate your VAT return.

warnings.largeReclaim: You are claiming a large VAT refund. HMRC may request additional documentation.
warnings.significantSalesChange: Your sales have changed by {{change}} compared to the previous period. Please verify this is correct.
warnings.significantPurchasesChange: Your purchases have changed by {{change}} compared to the previous period. Please verify this is correct.
warnings.highInputVat: Your input VAT (purchases) is significantly higher than output VAT (sales). This is unusual for most businesses.

reviewVerify.confirmText: By saving this VAT return, you confirm that the information is accurate to the best of your knowledge.
reviewVerify.disclaimer: This is a draft VAT return for your records. You must still file your actual return with HMRC through the Government Gateway portal.

filingInstructions.title: Filing Instructions
filingInstructions.description: Follow these step-by-step instructions to file your VAT return with HMRC. Have your calculated values ready to enter.
filingInstructions.savedDescription: Your VAT return has been saved. Follow the instructions below to file with HMRC.
filingInstructions.step1Description: Go to the HMRC website and log in with your Government Gateway credentials. If you don't have an account, you'll need to register first.
filingInstructions.step2Description: Once logged in, select 'VAT' from your services. If VAT is not listed, you may need to add it to your account.
filingInstructions.step3Description: Click on 'Submit VAT Return' and select the period you are filing for. Ensure it matches the period in your calculated return.
filingInstructions.step4Description: Enter the values from your calculated VAT return into the corresponding boxes on the HMRC form. Use the reference table below.
filingInstructions.step5Description: Carefully review all entered values. Once submitted, you cannot make changes without contacting HMRC.
filingInstructions.step6Description: After submission, save or print the confirmation receipt. You will need this as proof of filing.
filingInstructions.boxValuesDescription: Enter these values in the corresponding boxes on the HMRC VAT return form:
filingInstructions.deadlinesDescription: VAT returns and payments are due one month and 7 days after the end of the VAT period:
filingInstructions.filingDeadline: Filing deadline: 1 month and 7 days after period end
filingInstructions.paymentDeadline: Payment deadline: Same as filing deadline for online payments
filingInstructions.helpDescription: If you need assistance with filing your VAT return, refer to these HMRC resources:
filingInstructions.disclaimerText: This guide is for reference only. Always verify the current HMRC requirements before filing. The calculated values are based on the transactions you have recorded in this application.
